mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, pw, nickname, phone, email, address1, address2, address3, zip_code, authority, sign_date) values( #{user_id}, #{pw}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{address3}, #{zip_code}, '일반', (select * from todaytime) )
mapper.select: SELECT nickname FROM users where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company VALUES ( (select concat('com', (nvl(max(substr(company_id, 4)), 0)+1)) from company), #{company_name}, '2023/10/25', #{company_homepage}, #{company_address1}, #{company_address2}, #{company_email}, #{zip_code} )
